prompts.title: Resume Bullet Points
prompts.prompt_text:
Rewrite the following job responsibility into a strong, achievement-oriented resume bullet point. Use action verbs, quantify impact where possible, and keep it concise.

Input:
[Paste job responsibility here]
prompts.example_output: Spearheaded cross-functional sales initiatives, driving a 20% increase in quarterly revenue while expanding key enterprise accounts.

prompts.title: Python Bug Fixer
prompts.prompt_text:
You are a senior Python developer. Analyze the following error message and code snippet. Explain the root cause in simple terms and provide a corrected version of the code.

Error:
[Paste error message]

Code:
[Paste Python code]
prompts.use_case: Fixing Python errors quickly and correctly
prompts.example_output: The IndexError occurs because the loop exceeds the list length. Updating the loop condition prevents out-of-range access.

prompts.title: Polite Email Decline
prompts.prompt_text:
Write a polite, professional email declining the following invitation. Maintain a respectful tone, express gratitude, and keep the door open for future opportunities.

Context:
[Paste invitation details]
prompts.example_output: Thank you for the invitation. Unfortunately, I won’t be able to attend at this time, but I’d be happy to stay in touch for future opportunities.

prompts.title: SQL Query Optimizer
prompts.prompt_text:
You are a database performance expert. Review the following SQL query and suggest optimizations to improve performance. Explain why each change helps.

Query:
[Paste SQL query]

Database:
[MySQL/PostgreSQL/Other]
prompts.example_output: Adding an index on the WHERE clause column reduces full table scans and significantly improves execution time.

prompts.title: Cold Outreach Message
prompts.prompt_text:
Write a short, personalized cold outreach message for the following product. Keep it under 100 words, highlight the main value proposition, and end with a clear call to action.

Product details:
[Paste product info]

Target audience:
[Describe audience]
prompts.example_output: Hi [Name], I noticed your team is scaling rapidly. Our tool helps reduce onboarding time by 40%. Would you be open to a quick 10-minute chat?

prompts.title: Explain Code Like I'm Five
prompts.prompt_text:
Explain the following code in very simple terms, as if teaching a complete beginner. Avoid jargon and use analogies where helpful.

Code:
[Paste code]
prompts.example_output: This code is like a checklist that looks at each item one by one and decides whether to keep it or skip it.

prompts.title: Meeting Summary Generator
prompts.prompt_text:
Summarize the following meeting notes into clear action items, decisions made, and next steps. Keep the summary concise and structured.

Meeting notes:
[Paste notes]
prompts.use_case: Turning raw notes into actionable summaries
prompts.example_output: Decision: Approve Q2 roadmap. Action: John to finalize timeline by Friday.

prompts.title: Startup Idea Validator
prompts.prompt_text:
Act as a startup advisor. Evaluate the following startup idea for market potential, target users, risks, and possible improvements.

Idea:
[Describe startup idea]
prompts.example_output: The idea solves a real problem for SMBs, but differentiation and pricing strategy need refinement.
